title: Crypto Bank Silvergate Repays Deposits as Part of Liquidation Plans
description:
Silvergate Capital, a cryptocurrency-focused bank, announced on Wednesday it had fully reimbursed all remaining deposit liabilities, Reuters reported. The recent move follows the bank’s decision to cease operations earlier this year. According to the report, Silvergate announced in March that it intended to voluntarily liquidate after suffering losses as a result of the sudden collapse […]
